page.title: 14Law and Order
page.content: Law and order is enfornced by a team of police officers under the aegis of Derbyshire Constabulary. There are 36 full-time policemen, 5 full-time policewomen, 8 sergeants, 4 inspectors, 1 chief inspector and l superintendent. There are 4 panda (patrol) cars, 1 police carrier, 2 traffic cars,l motor cycle and 8 pedal cycles for the officers use. There are also 8 special constables, offering voluntary service. The area has 6 police houses, 1 police office and 1 central police station. There is a Magistrate's court, close to the police station, holding session 5 days a week and a special court may be held at the police station on Saturdays and Bank Holidays if necessary.
